title: Filmmaker David Lynch Remembered by Hollywood Friends and Collaborators
description: The industry paid tribute to the groundbreaking talent behind Blue Velvet, Twin Peaks, and more.
author: Sabina Graves

Our friendship blossomed on Blue Velvet and then Twin Peaks and I always found him to be the most authentically alive person I‚Äôd ever met.

David was in tune with the universe and his own imagination on a level that seemed to be the best version of human. He was not interested in answers because he understood that questions are the drive that make us who we are. They are our breath.

While the world has lost a remarkable artist, I‚Äôve lost a dear friend who imagined a future for me and allowed me to travel in worlds I could never have conceived on my own.
